reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Visited this pub during our stay at Cledan Valley Tipi's.
reviews.title: Yummy Food.

reviews.text: Yummy food with a few unique choices for a pub.
reviews.title: Very Pleasent INN

reviews.text: We arrived at 2.10 , lunch had finished at 2pm, on a wet Wednesday in October. We had driven up from Tintern Abbey and were looking forward to lunch having found the pub in the Good Pub Guide 2012 . When we arrived the barmaid greeted us warmly and asked had we wanted lunch? We said yes and she asked the kitchen and they agreed to give us anything off the lunch menu. We had two cheese and had ham toasties with yummy well- cooked chips and two pints of Sunshine Ale from Monty's Brewery in Montgomery. A perfect lunch! Thanks very much to the charming barmaid and cook who stayed late to make our lunch.
reviews.title: Welcoming lunch stop ....after lunch!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Aleppo last weekend (7-9 Sept) and stayed in room 4. Having stayed in a variety of BnB's, hotels etc, I can honestly say this was one of the best.
reviews.title: Fabulous BnB, lovely staff and stunning surroundings

reviews.text: Firstly you are greeted by a warm and friendly bar with staff to match and shown to a comfortable, clean and warm room. After settling in we went for dinner and drinks. The food was fabulous (we had breakfast, lunch and dinner) and all consistently good.
reviews.title: Rooms OK. Service OK

reviews.text: We tried to get a taxi to a function we were going to up the road, and in the absence of any taxis the barman and landlord were able to help us out - which was a really lovely touch.
reviews.title: Fabulous place for overnight stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all this place is fabulous, and if I could give it 12/10 then I would!!
reviews.title: Excellent Stopover
